reviews.review: Después de jugar este juego cientas de veces en el transcurso del tiempo, hay que tener en cuenta que este fue el juego que le dio un comienzo a la historia de Half-Life en general, independientemente de las expansiones, Half Life es una maravilla, en el que encarnamos al Dr. Gordon Freeman, un físico Teórico que se levantaba y llegaba tarde a su trabajo (como todo intelectual), donde precisamente en ese mismo día acontenció la cascada de Resonancias que dio origen a esta hermosa historia... Cabe mencionar que los Puzzle como los enemigos, todo esta bien balanceado, como cualquiera de los científicos de Black Mesa, este se mueve a través de las instalaciones para garantizar su supervivencia, donde también intenta "Fixear" esa brecha que creo las cascada de Resonancias en la Tierra. Es un magnifico juego.
Still waiting for #3... any year now...
Заранее извиняюсь за потраченое вами время этот обзор для ачивы
go play the black mesa remake instead. this is that, but bad

The attention to detail in Valve’s games has never been amiss and I’ve always been impressed by how much they put into this series. The setting for the game is an underground research facility, your character witnesses a catastrophe that plunges the facility into chaos. You have to fend off alien species to escape the facility and try to figure out what is happening. It’s a sci-fi game and that’s what gives it its character. The weapons especially get more interesting as the game develops, as you start to discover more and more alien technology.

I used to love watching my dad play this as a kid, but I just never managed to be able to get very far myself until I decided to go back to it now. The Half-Life 1 series is extremely nostalgic to me and its great still being able to play these games despite how old they are. For me, they are great, but I imagine for people that have never played them before, they might just look awful. 
Despite that, I would hope the overall feel and story of the game would be compelling enough to make those people enjoy it anyway.

Half-Life: Source has a few bugs here and there, a few of which I thought were going to be game breaking for me. But there was always a way around it. The glitches and bugs were tedious but given how old the game is it’s forgivable. 

The source engine reboot of this game changes up the game quite a bit. It was given new map textures, new weapon models, new NPC models and enhances to the sound. The changes are good, they definitely make the game look better. But I enjoy the original just as much, if not more. I’m used to and remember the old one. Which oddly, when I played this game I’m not too sure what happened with it. I downloaded the game, fired it up and played quite a bit in one session. Not noticing that it was all actually the old game assets. I shut it down and gave the game a break and when I booted it back up suddenly the new stuff was being used. Weird!

Anyway, there is never a dull moment in this game, there is action and something new always around the corner. It’s essentially a first person shooter, but it manages to break it up in-between and give you enough else to do so that it doesn’t get boring. 

It’s all around a fun game and I think you should give it a try, even if you haven’t got that Half-Life nostalgia that I do.


TL;DR : Old but great, lot of nostalgia for me. It’s a good first person shooter sci-fi game, give it a try.

Through use of the source engine, this game is an excellent rehash of the original "Half-Life." Play and enjoy it.

This game take the original 1998 version to a whole new level. It runs a lot better using the Source engine instead of the GoldSrc (my opinion) It also introduces new weapon models and better graphics.

One of my favorite games out of my favorite franchise. If you are playing it just now in 2015 or later, you should probably buy the source version (THIS ONE) because it looks a bit better and works more fluidly with modern machines. That being said if you do have win 10 or anything like that but you do want to play the original (Half-Life) , Valve has done a good job keeping this game pretty much fully functional. If you really REALLY cant stand playing an old game like this (I have friends who have problems with this) you could give the Black Mesa mod a shot. Its on steam for $20.
100% recomendado.

This game is the orginal Half-Life just running on source engine for polishing the edges! Fairly linear FPS shooter with precise writing for a smooth transition into Half Life 2,  this game has helluva a lot of original creativity and "infinite poetential" for when this game was first published in 1999.  If you do happen too purchase this game I hope you enjoy a polished classic. 

P.S. - My only regret was beating this game in one sitting

Il primo Half Life! Quanti ricordi!!! Uno dei migliori fps di sempre, con grafica ritoccata(ma non stravolta), motore fisico, ombre dinamiche, effetti luce e particellari implementati, tutto in full hd. Unica critica negativa... i BUG cazzo!!! Può essere mai che un gioco così datato venga rilanciato con dei bug? Dovrebbe essere allo stato d'arte, senza una pecca e invece... Comunque rimane un gioco imperdibile, uno dei veri e puri fps di un tempo, con una trama solida e un gameplay classico vecchia scuola. Prendetelo non ve ne pentirete!
"Efsane" tekrar tekrar bitirebileceğim oyunlardan.. Grafiklerin iyileştirilmeside ayrı bir incelik olmuş, Bence FPS bağımlıların oynaması gereken oyun.
Perfeito! Depois de tanto tempo, eu sabia que precisava jogar Half Life para me entender como gamer. Joguei e adorei. Não tem como não se viciar e cair de cabeça nessa franquia.

Что же такое HL: Source?
На конец 2015г. это местами(да чуть ли не повсеместно!) до безобразия глючный AI:
- Хедкрабы могут кряхтеть, заметив игрока, и не двигаться. Даже вплотную!
- Спецназ так и стоит, выставляя из-за угла свою тушку, пока её отбивают из глока (скопировано из оригинала)
- Зомби и в оригинале не славились подвижностью, но тут отупели от движка до инвалидности.
Лично мне движок (а, точнее, сочетание движка и карт) вообще не понравился:
- С такой скоростью перемещения нормально получится только ураганить, иначе приходится дозировать перемещение, либо по большей части красться. Бред, напряг и недоделка.
- Постоянное изменение скорости перемещения при переходе с одной поверхности на другую.
В общем, оригинальная версия органична и самодостаточна, это же напоминает дорелизную бетку.
Напоследок отмечу, что порой игра жутко тормозит, пока не сменишь разрешение(можно и вернуть потом). Сейчас этого стало меньше, но факт фактом.
Наверное, это слишком много - ожидать от игры, вышедшей и портированной хрен знает как давно стабильной и адекватной работы?

Parecchi anni fa completai Half-Life 2, ma non giocai mai al primo titolo. Ho deciso di recuperare questa grave mancanza. Che dire, il gioco già in difficoltà normale risulta essere impegnativo e a volte per andare avanti bisogna risolvere dei veri e propri rompicapi. Ho preso questo articolo con il bundle "Half-Life Complete", quindi l'ho provato pure con l'engine grafico del tempo, il grosso problema è che giocavo in 4:3, cosa per me molto fastidiosa, ho risolto il problema con questa versione, la quale vede il motore grafico aggiornato al Source, ciò mi consente di giocare tranquillamente in 16:9. Se devo essere sincero, ho gradito molto di più HL2, per le sue meccaniche di gioco, per la grafica e per le ambientazioni che mutavano nel corso dell'intero gameplay, lasciando spazio anche a paesaggi aperti. Tuttavia, per essere un gioco uscito nel 1998, bisogna riconoscere che è fatto veramente bene e ancora oggi si difende e surclassa (in termini di difficoltà) molti giochi odierni. Inutile spendere altre parole, è sicuramente un gioco che va acquistato.

Bought this a couple of years ago, and wasn't impressed at all. Should have just bought the original Half Life. This is basically just the regular Half Life with ragdolls, and some better shaders. If your looking for a Half Life 1 with better visuals, get Black Mesa, it's far better. Or just get the regular game and the expansion packs.

A classic worth playing. Great example of minimalistic storytelling (there is zero exposition in this). There are no pauses or breaks in this game and the intensity grows until the big finale. Very challenging--but fair--difficulty that has you conserving ammo and searching every nook and cranny for all the secret staches. The game doesn't overstay its welcome, but the ending certainly leaves you wanting more (fortunately there IS more).

Никогда бы не подумал, что буду писать отрицательную рецензию на одну из игр от Valve. Но вот я здесь, и эта игра [u] Half-Life: Source[/u].
Игра с самого начала цепляет в ностальгический хват, и ты не видишь в начале игры ничего отрицательного, но потом ты замечаешь все минусы этого [strike] куска дерьма [/strike] "шедевра". Это баги, если что. Пропадающие текстуры ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784689396] http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784689396 [/url]), застревающее в стенах оружие ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784697677] http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784697677 [/url]), вылетающие за текстуры модельки ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784693554] http://steamcommunity.com/id/grokholtcevilya/screenshot/575696032784693554 [/url]). Но зато они исправили [strike] баги [/strike] "фичи" из оригинальной Half-Life (даже распрыжки норм нету:( ). Из плюсов:[b] ВОДИЧКА [/b] и та самая физика обьектов. Отличный ИИ и необычная подача сюжета - заслуги оригинальной игры, а не ремейка.
Оценка: 3-/5.

[h1] Half Life: Source [/h1]

Atmosphere- This game brings me back to the times of Goldeneye 007 for the nintendo 64, which anyone growing up in the 90's played non stop. This is no suprise seeing as the this game was released in 98, unfortunately PC gamers were not as popular at my age when this game was released.

Review- Were I to review this game in 1998 , I would have been blown away by the story and gameplay, but seeing as this is 2015 I cant say that I am blown away, but I can appreciate a classic game during this day and age for what is was. Half Life is a fantastic game, and anyone who is a collector or can appreciate classic games must buy it, there is a reason it is still on the top 50 games of all time lists everywhere you look.

Combat- Ok let me first say, the shooter part of this game is done fairly well, but the crowbar combat is super bad, the game like you to be in just the right spot and swinging your crowbar perfectly for you to kill things with it, which is not a big deal since you won't be using the crowbar for combat really unless oyu run out of ammo haha.

Story- THE STORY BECOMES FAR CLEARER WHEN YOU PLAY HALFLIFE 2. Half Life has a great story, but it is not easy to pick up on , you have an idea throughout the game of what is going on and who you are, but at the end is when you really get a sense of what is to come. I will not discuss the story to avoid spoilers, but PAY ATTENTION to what the NPCS are saying and especially the man in the blue suit. There is no Journal or logbook, so you just have to remember what is going on. That being said, Half Life 2 is a must pick up after you play this.

Replay Value- Next to none unless you want to do the achievment system, or if you want to beat it on a higher difficulty, but in my opinion the NORMAL diffculty is actually pretty challenging.

Rating- 8/10, Receiving an 8 because of length of the story, there are times when you just want to get to the end and you feel it is being dragged out by needless extra puzzles that are just there to annoy you(the puzzles are not hard), but regardless great game must play.

This game is very good, I barely ran into any bugs. The graphics are much more enhanced, now we actually have shiny objects. However there is not a lot of mod support nor do people try to mod this game. I'd stay away from this one and play it safe, just get the original Half-Life. Also Half Life Source does not have a multiplayer function built into the game. Instead Valve decided Hey let's split up the game into two so we can make double the money hehehehe. So not only with the original are you getting mods, you're also getting multiplayer. That's my review thank you have a good day, if you have any questions on this review just send me a steam message or something.
найс

Holy crap! That was amazing, loved almost everything about it! only thing that was off... was that some chapters were really... repetetive. Managing Health and Armor is a really, really tough thing to keep in shape whenever it comes to tough situations such as "On a Rail", "Surface Tension", Or even "Interloper". But overall, great game. #MakeHalf-life3!
Not going into a lot of detail. But bypass this buy the Original or the  new Black Mesa

Não sei se vale a pena....digo vos já que não acho muito difernte...joguei nos originais e assim prefiro...

De certeza que esta está com melhorias visuais mas prefire o original...
Классика!

Muitos bugs, inclusive alguns que comprometiam minha jogabilidade, como o elevador saindo de dentro da parede, piso molhado que não freia, mira travando e mais uma caralhada de bugs visuais(olhe minhas prints). Teve mais alguns que eu não consegui printar, como o cientista do capitulo Lambda Complex que simplesmente não abria a merda da porta para mim(resultado, tive que reiniciar o capitulo e para piorar o jogo ainda me deixa com uma merreca de munição que me faz morrer inúmeras vezes para os Black Ops.
O problema não é nem ser bugado, o problema é que uma empresa tão respeitada como a Valve não ter consertado ainda, o jogo não é lá tão grande, não é um GTA V onde consertam 3 bugs e surgem 5.

Compre a versão normal do jogo(caso nunca tenha jogado) ou compre o Black Mesa: Source
Há algumas melhorias de texturas e umas coisinhas, sendo que tal melhoria já podia ser atingida por um mod do Blue Shift que atinge o HL normal também(Blue Shift Unlocked). Lembrando que com o preço full deste jogo você compra o HL1 Anthology com 50% que ainda vem com TFC.

Why should you buy this instead of the original one? First of its using the source engine and source engine is from 2004 which has good HD quailty like todays hl2 series have. The original is always better but the pros about this is not becuause its better quailty. I bought the HL Complete pack which I installed the source one. If youre familiar with source games this will be easier for  you compared to the original one. Im so used with how valves games work and this will be fun to play in source.

10/10 ШУТЕР ВЕКА БЕЗ САРКАЗМА
+ АТМОСФЕРА
+ ХАРДКОРНОСЬ
+ФИЗИКА СТРЕЛЬБЫ
+ ПОВЕСТВОВАНИЕ
-/+ОЧЕНЬ ОЧЕНЬ ЧУВСТВИТЕЛЬНАЯ МЫШЬ, НО МОЖНО ПРИВЫКНУТЬ
НЕ РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ТОЛЬКО ССАНЫМ ГРАФОДРОЧЕРАМ И ЛЮБИТЕЛЯМ ЛЕГКОСТИ.
Its as if Valve asked Bethesda to port this game over a few days.

We all know it. We all love it: The slightly unsual working day of our favorite hero Gordon at the probably most spectaculous fictive research facility for anormal materies "Black Mesa".

I remember playing this very game, published for the first time in 1998, since I was 13 years old. With friends or alone. Rushing through this impressive world of all kinds of "strange animals" while using common sence of logic for solving both challenging and adventurous tasks. It's all about... yes, what is Half-life actually about?

Seeing and playing the 90's biggest game returning in 2006 (I think?) with an absolute remade graphics, and although absolutely faithful to its original 1998-design, did really feel great! So many old memories, thoughts and even feelings were hidden for me personally in different chapters of the game. Last week I played the Source edition and remembered happy the last times, I played Half-life many, many, many years ago. Once again, it was a pleasure, Mr. Freeman! :-)
Half Life forever !!!!!!!!

[h1]Merhaba![/h1]
[b]"Half-Life: Source"[/b] adlı oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.

啊对不起，之前的评测还是太给面子有点手下留情了，这部作品我思来想去都觉得不应该去买，相对于这作我不如去玩原版的HL。用souce做的极没诚意，半条命2都出来了，把HL2的几个模型放进去优化优化不好吗？官方重置怎么着都比民间的好，不是黑山起源不好，那游戏确实诚意很足，但是优化肯定是不及V社的，如果当初重置出来的是黑山起源的效果，现在还会有黑山起源的制作小组吗？我们还会等黑山起源的XEN部分吗？V社这次就没有玩好，没有卡普空这个炒冷饭的功底（厚脸皮）就不要重置这个经典IP嘛。。。如果想体验重置的HL1，还是推荐黑山起源，本作对于原版HL1的优点：水面效果好了点、人物有阴影（这个效果在WON版HL1是可以通过控制台打开的，也不算优点了）枪模反光也没有，反正就一句话，你唯一买到这个游戏的途径，只可能是入了V社大包，否则单买的话土豪都会后悔一辈子的。I‘m FUCKING seriously!
